message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.GT. 

This paper deals with power and subcarrier allocation in OFDMA systems, which are typically studied in the networking and communication fields (cs.NI). The problem is formulated as a Markov Decision Problem (MDP) and involves stochastic optimization, which are topics commonly studied in information theory (cs.IT) and control systems (cs.SY). The paper also proposes a solution using stochastic approximation, which is a common technique in machine learning and optimization (cs.MA). Finally, the paper mentions the problem as a stochastic Network Utility Maximization (NUM) problem, which is a topic studied in game theory (cs.GT).
